entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: S 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
